name: OtterBash
description: Otter Bash!!! The Otters have escaped their habitat and are now wreaking havoc for world dominance. Battle your friends with the cute and adorable little critters. Destroy your opponents with unique weapons; dousing each other with Tar Balloons, smack them with the nifty Taco Boomerang, shove them into your "Portable Oven" and...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-2320 CPU @ 3.00GHz (4 CPUs), ~3.0GHz Memory: 32768 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX700 Series DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 139 MB available space Sound Card: Direct X compatible soundcard
